title: RITO PLEASE PUT FIORA"S PRICE DOWN
body:
Hi Riot,
According to the Permanent Price Reduction of Champions Fiora is due to be reduced in price seeing as Tahm Kench has been released! Please put her price down  Riot! 
Regards Jomoko2012

replies.body: Thanks Riot I just bought her :D

Thanks for the report jomoko2012, I have adjusted Fiora to 880 RP and 4800 IP. I'm sorry that I missed that earlier.

GL;HF
Riot Cochese
